release_notes.en-US: Added note that the fortune cookie files need to be UTF-8 encoded and fixed wrong version number in About box.

Fixed use of deprecated interfaces that are not longer available in TB17+
Added zh-CN localization

release_notes.en-US:
Added Swedish translation (thanks to Lakrits)
Update Portugues (Brasil) translation (thanks to humbertosartini)

* Fixed the cookie file bug (mentioned by the reviewers leyabe and wovenlander)
* Added French translation (thanks to ioreker)
* Added Polish translation (thanks to Wacław Jacek)
release_notes.de:
* Den "cookie file bug" behoben (erwähnt von leyabe und wovenlander)
* Französische Übersetzung (ioreker)
* Polnische Übersetzung (Wacław Jacek)
